entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 29 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
